channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
how do i get my client attached to my server?
317 Source: Allstarscape Client: Galkons anarchy
i have the client working right now but i wanna put it into a download.

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @dude1332 dude1332
item.description:
@dude1332 wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:2, topic:327542”]oh this is easy.

in your client files.
got to client.java
find where the IP settings are and change them to your IP from no-ip or hamachi or whatever you use.

then make sure your no-ip or hamachi or whatever you use is running.
and your run.exe in your server files is running.
compress your client folder
upload it on one of the free file hosting sites.
then put the address of the file download on the server status page (NOT ON FORUMS)
along with a little description of your server.

log yourself into the server using the IP from localhost or your no-ip or hamchi or whatever you use

then people should be able to connect to your server, and you should be able to see them, interact with them etc etc[/quote]

where are the ip settings…

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

oh this is easy.

in your client files.
got to client.java
find where the IP settings are and change them to your IP from no-ip or hamachi or whatever you use.

then make sure your no-ip or hamachi or whatever you use is running.
and your run.exe in your server files is running.
compress your client folder
upload it on one of the free file hosting sites.
then put the address of the file download on the server status page (NOT ON FORUMS)
along with a little description of your server.

log yourself into the server using the IP from localhost or your no-ip or hamchi or whatever you use

then people should be able to connect to your server, and you should be able to see them, interact with them etc etc

Read full topic
